name: Aaron York
text: Best Little Caesars I've been to, Delicious pizza!

name: David T
text: The pizza is only decent, but at the price point nobody else even comes close to their quality.  Ordering online, my food has always been ready in 15 minutes or less.  The Pick Up Portal eliminates the need for customer service, but whenever I have interacted with the staff they've seemed friendly and polite.

name: Matt Ruzicka
text: Not a huge fan of the pizza, but it works in a pinch. And the kids love it. What I can say is I've never had a bad experience in this shop. Everyone has been so nice and helpful. So many places around here, people working there act like the â€¦More

name: InfinityForever
text: The best pizza in my personal opinion, but then again I'm a huge fan of stuffed crust pizza. Since the only other restaurant that does stuff crust pizza is Pizza Hut, I MUCH prefer Little Caesars even if a gun were too my head forcing me to â€¦More

name: James Palomo
text: We came to this location because another didn't order stuffed crust ingredients. Odd however, this location didn't disappoint and waiting for a fresh pie is worth it!! It's not the closest location but it honestly tasted better than most in the area.

name: praing mantis
text: They advertise menu items on TV but do not offer them in the store. Seems odd to cunduct business this way. On a positive note, we used to go to Little Caesar's when I was young almost every Friday night. Now they have opened more locations in recent years and there is one near our current home. We rediscovered the good pizza again.

name: Z C
text: The pizza tastes great for an even better price. Love their app as well.

name: Kim Karam
text: Came here earlier today and was served by a fiendly member of staff. I bought the 5 meat pizza and a cheese bread- both were made very quickly. â€¦More

name: Jennifer Knowles
text: I got the pretzel pizza, I did not realize it had the nacho cheese instead of regular pizza sauce. It was kinda gross. I ate it because I was very hungry. The kids will not touch it. Their regular pizza is great though.

name: Patricia Vaughn
text: I was impressed by the professionalism of the staff. I must admit, I didn't have great expectations for the restaurant,  but the knowledge and customer service of 2 of the team members was impressive.

name: linda kniess
text: Food was great.  Employees were very helpful and quick.  I'm a very impatient person.  This will be my pizza and wing place from now on.  Thank you

name: chuck mack
text: Little Caesars is old-school pizza. I mean $5 for mountain dew and pizza I'm straight. Gotta love it lol.

name: Aaron Richter
text: Absolutely horrible customer service, don't even know their own menu and can't take on order to save their life. Better off driving to one of the others in the area.

name: Dave Hebb
text: I got the pretzel crust pizza. It was supposed to be one of the always ready, never wait. I had to wait 10 minutes. It wasn't too great. Dry, crust was way too thick.

name: Patty Deimler
text: Not happy. I called in two pretzel pizzas. Each one with a different topping. They told me 10 to 15 minutes. I waited 50 minutes before I got my pizzas. I had called twice to make sure they got the order right. When I got home with the â€¦More

name: Sarah
text: Could use a good sparkle and shine inside. Quick food.

name: Ursula Bosic
text: Customer service was good even though she was clearly in the weeds and the pizza was great!  I arrived right after a rush and no pie was available...ended up ordering via the app, which was super easy!

name: Annie McCormick
text: I placed a large order online of 10 pizzas for a Cub Scouts event. The order was ready when I got there and one of the staff helped me carry it out. The pizzas were a huge hit at the event. However, the slices were a bit uneven so we had to â€¦More

name: Aly Bee
text: When they arent too busy, this place is great. The pizza is fine and the employees are friendly.

name: Doug Jones
text: The lady that always says have a positive day has great customer service skills, if she's not there the service is so so.

name: Chris Maroney
text: Really good deep dish stuffed-crust pizza. Great prices. However, stuffed-crust pizza is a special order and have to wait, even during the "hot & ready" period.

name: Rachel Asmus
text: I don't understand how everyone says this place is great. Sure the pizza is great, but every time I've come here they never have pizza ready. Their slogan is 'hot and ready', am I right? NEVER ready. I usually have to wait 10-15 minutes for a cheese every single time. This place is absolutely horrible.

name: Valerea King
text: Pizza was fine but apparently Shaun HATES his job. Comes thru very clearly during the customer service experience. Skip here when he's there ðŸ˜•

name: Justin Martin
text: Food was good, service was slow. Hot n ready is only a theory.

name: Concerned Customer
text: Pizza was cold. Some bum asked for money as soon as I exited my vehicle and then asked for a cigarette. I told the manager to call the police to get rid of the vermin but have no idea if he did.

name: Danny Murray
text: Always wait, even when ordering ahead and showing up 25 minutes later. Great pizza and wings and the 2, yes only 2, guys working are nice and accommodating but they need more workers.

name: S Cornoyer
text: Always good pizza and ready to go...  But not always easy to phone in...  They're busy!

name: William K.
text: Takes absolutely forever to get your food,but the employee at the counter was plenty nice.

name: Brian Marrero
text: Very clean. Pizza was nice and hot. Crazy bread was fresh and not hard like most little Caesars I've visited.

name: Taxi Lanyley park
text: This place is understaff and employees argue too much with each other,this means customers has to wait longer times for a classic pizza,much longer for a custom pizza,had to wait 25 minutes for a hawaiian pizza and i was the only customer inside,so please less arguing and more baking,customer first arguing for the park

name: Travis Gray
text: Made my pizza fresh for me by request

name: Quelvin Gonzalez
text: It hot but not ready, waited 25 minutes for cheese and pep

name: richard Fields
text: Ordered a pizza on the spot. It took about 15 minutes but was worth the wait.

name: lakeysha pennix
text: Nice, hot food and friendly service!!!!

name: Mike Kenny
text: Thank you . Great service and food

name: Khary Ward
text: The lady who greets you @ the counter with the dreads is very nice and professional. The pizza is great and there is no long wait!

name: K V
text: Clean and food tends to be good but the quality is inconsistent. One day the cheese is delicious and the next is meh. Would love to give them five stars but for the inconsistencies.

name: Herbert -Kwame Dixon
text: They pizza better than pizza hut

name: Jessi Mae
text: I couldn't figure out why this place had so many bad reviews... I think I know now. If they hired more people like the usual guy who is always there I wouldn't have had to completely change my review and type this wall of text. The only â€¦More

name: Tammy Park
text: I love their new online ordering system!!!

name: J Wood
text: Twice now we have gotten home to raw, undercooked bread sticks. The pizza was barely cooked as well. And, like other reviews here, they almost never have pizza made in advance, making us wait 10-15 minutes. Will never be going here again.

name: Mark Tran
text: Surprising good pizza. Friendly and fast service.

name: Jerry
text: The employee was very ignorant and acted like he didn't want to be there.

name: Erik W
text: This location is closed

name: Skullkid Skulking Kids
text: Great service easy delicious pizza

name: Nick Kourpias
text: Good for the price, super cheap and super quick, usually can walk out with a hot pizza in less than 2 minutes!

name: Anne Marie Madairy
text: Quick option to get a pizza.  Love being able to get crazy bread again.

name: Edman Chavez
text: In and out in less than 5 minutes with my pizza! Also I like that dipping sauce...

name: P N
text: This location is cloaed

name: Heather Kendrick
text: Very slow! Didnâ€™t answer phone! Never coming back!

name: Cristi Bancewicz
text: Best pizza ever!!

name: Antonio Marsiglia
text: Food was hot and fresh and service was great!

name: Jinmin Zhou
text: Celebrating Inc's historic Win!

name: harryyffhhifcbm Smitbrgbxxghgt
text: Great Pizza even better prices

name: Taylor
text: Puts way to much sauce on the pizza, other than that its okay.

name: Raven Brown
text: Worst Pizza Ever!! Was cold not even hot and tasted stale.

name: Justin Nixon
text: Good cheap pizza

name: Amy Tegeder
text: Nicest employees and yummy pizza!

name: Anderson Felix
text: Always a good pizza for the price you pay.

name: Kevin Green
text: Its little Caesars, just average food

name: Tonia Jones
text: It was nice and fast

name: Rachael S
text: Stop there for a quick hot and ready deep dish and then was told that they don't have any deep dish pizzas and that we couldn't even wait for one to be made because they sold out so how is that hot and ready pizza?ðŸ¤” â€¦More

name: Erin Somoza
text: Delicious

name: Asad Khan
text: :)yum

name: NoE
text: Had to wait 30 mnts to get a pizza..

name: Robert Rhome 87
text: Cheap lunch

name: Caitlin Nichols
text: We had a pretty bad experience tonight with this location but the manager called and apologized profusely which meant a lot.

name: Cameron Glorioso
text: Very fast and very friendly!

name: Michael Fenn
text: Seemingly uncooked bread sticks, only two pizzas ready, and the pizza is cold.

name: Sirena Ministrelli
text: great service!!

name: Jacob Smith
text: Good!

text: No comment
